One of the most common questions we get about the gala is "What do I wear?".

While we will not turn anyone away at the door for their attire (ok....don't make us eat our words...ha!), you will see a wide range of clothing choices. Most women will be in a dress; most men in dress slacks and a button up shirt. Dress it up, dress it down. The choice is yours!

The safe zone is somewhere between semiformal and business casual. Find what makes you feel flawless!
